title: Radioisotope analytical techniques in mineral processing
creator_credit: Perier Films and Australian Atomic Energy Commission
brief_description: Shows use of radioisotopes in continuous on-stream analysis in mineral processing. Describes how the technique was developed by the Commission and its value in immediate and accurate detection of valuable elements. Suggests possible application in automatic control.
